did.abstract: Payroll record of the New York State National Guard 51st Cavalry Brigade for the period August 1 to September 30, 1940.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The New York State National Guard 51st Cavalry Brigade was organized circa 1920 and held its headquarters at an armory on Staten Island formerly known as Manor Farm.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
